thread.title: Want to smell like an Andy Kaufman prank? - KOTA-TV Rapid City
thread.title_full: Want to smell like an Andy Kaufman prank? - KOTA-TV Rapid City - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KOTA-TV Rapid City
title: Want to smell like an Andy Kaufman prank? - KOTA-TV Rapid City
text:
Xyrena, a California company that bills itself as a "celebrity partnered on-demand perfumery," is releasing "Andy Kaufman Milk & Cookies," a fragrance inspired by the comedian's 1979 Carnegie Hall show that ended with him taking the house out for ... milk and cookies ... in a fleet of waiting buses. The scent, which will sell for $42, is being released to coincide with the 40th anniversary of the legendary late comic's appearance on the debut episode of "Saturday Night Live," according to the company.
 KOTA-TV Rapid City.
